original_definition: 'operation mode' means the status of the oven or hob during use;
generated_definition: 'operation mode' means the operation mode of an oven is the manner in which it circulates heated air inside its cavity, and can be either conventional or forced.

Article 2: ‘conventional mode’ means theoperation modeof anovenonly using natural convection for circulation of heated air inside thecavity of the oven;
‘operation mode’ means the status of the oven or hob during use;
‘conventional mode’ means the operation mode of an oven only using natural convection for circulation of heated air inside the cavity of the oven;
‘operation mode’ means the status of theovenorhob during use;
